interpretation:
Opener:	 has 13-21 points and 3+ clubs.
	Denies 5 card major
	Denies balanced hand
Responder:	Has 6-9 points
	Denies support for clubs
	Denies a 4 card major
	Denies 4+ diamonds

hints.hint0: Need 5 clubs to bid them again
hints.hint1:
Small=13-15, Medium=16-18, Large=19-21
Look for balanced hand or 5+ in opening suit
hints.hint2:
13-15	Balanced	 Pass
	Unbal	5+C: 2C
		Default: Pass
16-18	Balanced:	2NT
	Unbal	W: 2W
		5+C: 3C
		Default: 2NT
19-21	Balanced: 	3NT
	Unbal	5+C: 4C
		W: JS
		Default: 3NT
